submissions.title: My submissions
submissions.teamViewSubtitle: You are viewing all submissions from your team
submissions.formSubtitle: Complete the steps to register your request
submissions.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your request clearly and in detail. Include all relevant information so the team can understand the context.
submissions.typeIncidenciaDesc: A bug, failure or unexpected behavior that needs to be fixed.
submissions.typeMejoraDesc: A new feature or improvement to an existing process.
submissions.typeProyectoDesc: A larger initiative requiring planning and multiple phases.
submissions.stepsToReproducePlaceholder:
1. Go to the reports section
2. Select the monthly report
3. Click 'Export PDF'
4. Observe the error
submissions.actualBehaviorPlaceholder: What happens instead of the expected?
submissions.businessJustificationPlaceholder: Why is this request important for the business? What problem does it solve?
submissions.expectedBenefitPlaceholder: What concrete improvement is expected? E.g.: Reduce process time by 50%
submissions.impactedUsersPlaceholder: E.g.: Sales team (15 people), Commercial management
submissions.attachmentsHint: Drag files here or click to select
submissions.attachmentsFormats: PNG, JPG, PDF, DOC — max. 5 MB per file
submissions.reviewHint: Verify the information is correct before submitting.
submissions.successMessage: Your request has been successfully registered and is now in the backlog.
submissions.countriesHint: Select one or more countries related to this request
submissions.successNextSteps: Your request will be reviewed by the development team and you can track its progress from the submissions section.
submissions.attachmentsOptionalHint: Attachments are optional, but screenshots or documents help resolve your request faster.
submissions.reviewNoAttachmentsWarning: No screenshots attached. For incidents, visual evidence significantly speeds up resolution.
submissions.infSectionHint: Answer these questions and the system will calculate priority using enterprise criteria.
submissions.infTimeQuestion: How soon must this be resolved?
submissions.infDisruptionQuestion: How does it affect daily operations?
submissions.infReachQuestion: How many people or areas are affected?
submissions.infBusinessImpactQuestion: If not resolved, how serious would it be for the business?
submissions.infResultHint: Admin and developer roles can adjust it later when needed.
submissions.infBizSupportLabel: Low: it's a minor or convenience improvement
submissions.infBizImportantLabel: Medium: it affects a day-to-day process
submissions.infBizCoreLabel: High: it could cause losses or compliance issues
submissions.infBizMissionLabel: Critical: the business cannot operate without this
